body.name: GL.iNet GL-MT3000 (Beryl AX) Pocket-Sized Wi-Fi 6 Wireless Travel Gigabit Router | WiFi Router | OpenVPN, Wireguard, Connect to Public & Hotel Wi-Fi login Page, RV
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 51 mins
features: 【DUAL BAND AX TRAVEL ROUTER】Products with US, UK, EU Plug; Dual band network with wireless speed 574Mbps (2.4G)+2402Mbps (5G); Tethering Compatible; 2.5G Multi-gigabit WAN port and a 1G gigabit LAN port; USB 3.0 port; Wi-Fi 6 offers more than double the total Wi-Fi speed with the MT3000 VPN Router.

【VPN CLIENT & SERVER】OpenVPN and WireGuard are pre-installed, compatible with 30+ VPN service providers. Simply log in to your existing VPN account with our portable wifi device, and Beryl AX automatically encrypts all network traffic within the connected network. Max. VPN speed of 150 Mbps (OpenVPN); 300 Mbps (WireGuard)

【OpenWrt 21.02 FIRMWARE】The Beryl AX is a portable wifi box and mini router that runs on OpenWrt 21.02 firmware. It supports more than 5,000 ready-made plug-ins for customization. Simply browse, install, and manage packages with our no-code interface within Beryl AX's Admin Panel.

【PROTECT YOUR NETWORK SECURITY】Our pocket wifi, unlike other vulnerable portable wifi hotspot for travel purposes supports WPA3 protocol–Preventive measures against password brute-force attacks; DNS over HTTPS & DNS over TLS–Protecting domain name system traffic and preventing data eavesdropping from malicious parties; IPv6–Built-in authentication for privacy protection, eliminating the need for network address translation.

【VPN CASCADING AT EASE】Surpassing the mediocre performance of most VPN routers for home usage, the Beryl AX is capable of hosting a VPN server and VPN client at the same time within the same device, enabling users to remote access local network resources like Wi-Fi printers or local web servers, and accessing the public internet as a VPN client simultaneously.

【PERFECT PORTABLE WIFI ROUTER FOR TRAVEL】The Beryl AX is an ideal pocket Wi-Fi device perfect for international travel. With its compact size and travel-friendly features, the portable Wi-Fi router is the perfect companion for travelers in need of a secure internet connectivity on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Travel Router - A Must Have
reviews.reviewText: A must have I would say if you are traveling, even if you work from coffee shop.Pros from my point of view:1. WiFi 6 for a reasonable cost. What kind of internet bandwidth you connect to will matter, but if you connect to a decent bandwidth speeds, this will transmit good network speed.2. Powers from USB-A or USB-C from my Macbook Pro (I used both USB-A to USB-C and USB-C to USB-C cables). This router has USB-C to power it up.3. It can connect from Wired, Wirless (2.4 GHz or 5 GHz), Cell Modem and Tethering. I tried Wired and Wirelsess and it worked flawlessly.4. It can transmit in both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz and has Guest Network also. Just in case you need to share your network with somebody, you do not need to give your main network's password.5. It has both VPN Client (to route your traffic via VPN Service) and VPN Server (to access your network from remote location). I am using only VPN Client functionality. With SurfShark it works great.6. I set up VPN Client. When it is turned off and it turned back on, it boots up with VPN, which is great. It has got quite a few modes under VPN Client. The entire traffic goes via VPN, or you can choose based on the target locations, or Client Device. I am using for the entire traffic as I pretty much use this only when I am away from home.7. As this has OpenWRT, it has lot of plugins and Advanced features that you normally wont see in a router this size and price.8. This has got Dynamic DNS functionality, just in case you do not have static IP and wanted to use VPN Server functionality in this router. I am not using this feature.9. You can connect Hard Drive with USB-A to this router and it can work as a Network Storage.10. It has got lot of other features that I do not use. Ex: AdGuard, Good Cloud etc.11. I tested this with my power bank that I charge my phones with while traveling. And it works great!12. This comes with a power supply and adapters to them that work in US, Asia and UK. But I probably stick with using from my laptop's USB slot to power it.Cons:1. This is pretty much with any networking device. You need a decent networking knowledge to set the VPN.2. The VPN Client did not work right out of the box. I had to upgrade the firmware and also go into Advanced features to upgrade all the OpenWRT modules.Overall I am very satisfied with this product. I would surely recommend this to anybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Compact Powerhouse for Seamless Connectivity
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the GL.iNet GL-MT3000 router to my networking setup, and it has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance, portability, and versatility.Design and Portability (5/5):The router's compact design is a game-changer for me. It's sleek, lightweight, and easy to carry, making it perfect for both home use and when I'm on the go. The sturdy build gives it a premium feel, and the external antenna adds a touch of practicality without compromising its sleek form.Performance (5/5):Despite its small size, the GL-MT3000 packs a punch in terms of performance. The dual-band support ensures reliable connectivity, even with multiple devices connected simultaneously. Browsing, streaming, and gaming have been seamless, and I appreciate the consistent signal strength throughout my space.OpenWrt Support (5/5):For someone who likes to tinker with network settings, the OpenWrt support is a standout feature. It provides the flexibility to customize and optimize my network according to my preferences. The Linux-based firmware adds an extra layer of control that I've been missing in other routers.Security Features (5/5):Security was a top priority for me, and the GL-MT3000 delivers. The WPA3 encryption, built-in firewall, and support for various VPN protocols give me confidence in the router's ability to protect my data and ensure a secure online experience.User-Friendly Interface (5/5):Setting up the router was a breeze, thanks to the intuitive web interface. The user-friendly dashboard makes it easy to navigate through settings, and the well-documented manual provides clear instructions. It strikes a perfect balance between being feature-rich and accessible.Travel Router Functionality (5/5):The travel router functionality is a fantastic addition. I recently used it on a business trip, and it provided reliable Wi-Fi access in my hotel room. This versatility sets the GL-MT3000 apart from other routers I've used in the past.In conclusion, the GL.iNet GL-MT3000 router is a compact powerhouse that delivers on all fronts. Its performance, combined with features like OpenWrt support and robust security, makes it a top choice for users who value both functionality and portability. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and customizable networking solution.

Needed a router that could use WiFi as the WAN interface and operate a Wireguard VPN tunnel between two residences. Most consumer routers have abysmal VPN throughput, but the wireguard client on this unit handily matches the 300mpbs throughput as advertised (using a Ubiquiti UDM-SE server on the other end).Small form factor makes it easy to place and the USB-C power input opens up a lot of flexibility (multi port chargers, battery backup, etc). The web configuration interface offers a host of advanced features (hosts list, static routing, etc) and the Adguard plug in does a great job of blocking ads at the network level.In my case I'm using it in a fixed installation, but definitely thinking about picking up a second for the stated travel purposes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto con detalles en software
reviews.reviewText: Ya he comprado productos de Gl.iNet, son de mucha calidad y son funcionales, hasta que el software te lo impide.En casa y en lugares donde la conexión es WiFi o vía Ethernet sin problema alguno han funcionado, pero me he topado ya dos casos en hoteles, donde los portales son "cautivos" (portales del hotel donde hay que poner usuario y contraseña) en los cuales no se podido realizar la conexión pese a seguir el tutorial y el manual para realizar la conexión en estos portales, ahi nunca se ha podido lograr.La conexión con VPN es muy sencilla, con esta versión de hardware y en conjunto con el software basta poner mi usuario y contraseña de NordVPN para bajar los setting en automatico, ya no se configura nada!La nueva función de ADblock es genial, bloquea TODO sin tener que tener software adicional.Espero pronto hagan o se conrriga eso de los portales cautivos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Petit routeur de voyage WIFI 6 incroyable
reviews.reviewText: Tout est dit dans l'image jointe. C'est le plus rapide de mes routeurs Wifi6 à la maison, tout en etant beaucoup plus petit et moins cher que la plupart des autres.Il est totalement silencieux, bien que doté d'un ventilateur que je n'ai jamais entendu se lancer. Je pense que ce ventilateur n'est présent que par securité.L'interface est simplifé, tout en laissant accés aux fonctions avancées très complètes sous jascentes.C'est un de mes meilleurs achats.Je ne peux que recommander ce petit bijou à emporter à chaque déplacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use. Very flexible with WAN options
reviews.reviewText: Bought this and configured this with ease.Tried tether to another wifi as well as using a usb cable to an Android phone on 5G. All works perfectly.VPN config was easy as well.Definitely recommend and will travel with it in the next 2 weeks.

Dopo aver utilizzato il GL.iNet GL-MT3000 (Beryl AX) per un po' di tempo, posso affermare con certezza che si tratta di un prodotto eccezionale, soprattutto per le esigenze professionali. La sua compatibilità con le tecnologie più recenti, come il WiFi 6 e la capacità AX3000Mbps, garantisce prestazioni di rete rapide e affidabili.Ciò che mi ha impressionato di più è la sua versatilità. Uso questo router principalmente per il lavoro, creando una connessione VPN con NordVPN. La configurazione è stata semplice e intuitiva, e l'accesso alle funzionalità avanzate come la cascata VPN e IPV6 ha ulteriormente rafforzato la mia sicurezza online. La stabilità della connessione è stata impeccabile, garantendo che le mie attività professionali rimanessero protette e senza interruzioni.La possibilità di utilizzarlo come ripetitore, access point o extender lo rende un dispositivo incredibilmente flessibile, adattabile a una vasta gamma di esigenze. La porta WAN a 2.5 Gb è un ulteriore vantaggio, assicurando una connessione veloce e senza ostacoli.Dal punto di vista della sicurezza, la compatibilità con WPA3 è un grande plus, offrendo una protezione avanzata contro potenziali minacce e intrusioni.In conclusione, il GL.iNet GL-MT3000 (Beryl AX) è un investimento valido per chiunque cerchi un router WiFi 6 di alta qualità, versatile e sicuro. La sua performance impeccabile e le funzionalità avanzate lo rendono ideale per utilizzi professionali e personali, confermando la sua posizione come uno dei migliori dispositivi della sua categoria sul mercato.Dopo aver utilizzato il GL.iNet GL-MT3000 (Beryl AX) per un po' di tempo, posso affermare con certezza che si tratta di un prodotto eccezionale, soprattutto per le esigenze professionali.
